title: Best of the Program | Guests: Michael Malice & Nicole Levitt | 10/14/22
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss whether a red wave will occur in the upcoming midterms and predict what the next two years will look like if it does. Author Michael Malice joins to give his take on the Alex Jones lawsuit and verdict. Attorney Nicole Levitt joins to discuss how she was asked to sign a contract agreeing that white people are racist at work and why she's speaking out — and suing her employer.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network

Glenn and Stu discuss whether a red wave will occur in the upcoming midterms and predict what the next two years will look like if it does. Author Michael Malice joins to give his take on the Alex Jones lawsuit and verdict. Attorney Nicole Levitt joins to discuss how she was asked to sign a contract agreeing that white people are racist at work and why she's speaking out — and suing her employer.
